actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to establish a new procedure for the election of the President and Vice President.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the direct popular election of the President and Vice President. Returns an electoral vote system, in which each congressional district established under this Article is entitled to one electoral vote, to be used when no pair of Presidential and Vice Presidential candidates receives a majority of the popular vote.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to establish a new procedure for the election of the President and Vice President.
